bug.author: typhoonzero
bug.summary: conv2d/conv3d op unitest fails when using cudnn7
bug.description: The test fails when using cuda 8.0 and cudnn 7 to build. I've tested using docker image paddlepaddle/paddle_manylinux_devel:cuda8.0_cudnn7.

comments.comment: Closing. This was because of the runtime . Mark <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chengduoZH>@chengduoZH</denchmark-link> .
